languages.text: Enemies attacked by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} reduced by −<u>(10 + Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> until the start of the Bladedancer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that were attacked by the Reaper have their Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill and Perception reduced by (10+Reaper's Weapon Skill Bonus) until the beginning of the Reaper's next turn. This effect does not stack.

Enemies attacked by the Bladedancer have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} reduced by −<u>(10 + Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} bonus)</u> until the start of the Bladedancer's next turn. These penalties do not stack.

These penalties do not stack.

languages.text: Los enemigos a los que ataca el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} reducen su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} en −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} del hoja danzante)</u> hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del hoja danzante. Estas {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} no son acumulativas.
